short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension used for research purposes that collects some tweets from your Twitter feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a browser extension used for research purposes that collects some tweets from your Twitter feed and then redirects you to a platform which asks some questions about your feed. The purpose of this study is to help us understand more about user experience on social media.
